If CSYSREQ is LOW, then CSYSACK is LOW or CSYSREQ is LOW in the next cycle.
If CSYSREQ is HIGH, then CSYSACK is HIGH or CSYSREQ is HIGH in the next cycle.
If CSYSACK is LOW and CSYSREQ is LOW, then CSYSACK is LOW in the next cycle.
If CSYSACK is HIGH and CSYSREQ is HIGH, then CSYSACK is HIGH in the next cycle.
If CSYSACK changes from LOW to HIGH, then CSYSREQ is HIGH.
If CSYSACK changes from HIGH to LOW, then CSYSREQ is LOW.
If CSYSREQ changes from LOW to HIGH, then CSYSACK is HIGH eventually.
If CSYSREQ changes from HIGH to LOW, then CSYSACK is LOW eventually.
